headline: Aluminum Laser Cleaning
alternativeHeadline: Advanced Laser Ablation Techniques for Aluminum
description: Laser cleaning of aluminum utilizes short pulses (ns-range) from fiber lasers at 1064 nm wavelength. The process relies on the rapid thermal expansion of surface contaminants, which have a lower vapor...
